about_the_game: Welcome to Dub Club, a third person multiplayer virtual music venue featuring an in-game live music stream. Live streams include a variety of electronic music genres including but not limited to Mainstage, House, Tech House, Techno, and Dubstep. Customize your character with a wide range of accessories and styles for Dub Club events. Once you're in the club, show off your dance moves with your friends from a large array of dance emotes provided in the player menu. An in-game chat menu allows you to communicate with your friends as you attend live events within the club. Join an existing party or host your own and enjoy live music with players who love house music as much as you do. Are you ready to party?

content_descriptors.notes: When customizing your character, clothing may be of a revealing nature.

Live streams include a variety of electronic music genres including but not limited to Mainstage, House, Tech House, Techno, and Dubstep. Customize your character with a wide range of accessories and styles for Dub Club events. An in-game chat menu allows you to communicate with your friends as you attend live events within the club. Join an existing party or host your own and enjoy live music with players who love house music as much as you do. Are you ready to party?
name: Dub Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A third person multiplayer virtual music venue featuring an in-game live music stream.
